scripts.create-uploads-folder: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const folder = path.join(process.env.INIT_CWD || process.cwd(), 'uploads'); if (!fs.existsSync(folder)) { fs.mkdirSync(folder, { recursive: true }); console.log('‚úÖ Created uploads folder'); } else { console.log('üìÅ uploads folder already exists ‚Äî nothing to do.'); }"
scripts.setup: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npm run create-uploads-folder
scripts.reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npm run create-uploads-folder
scripts.precompile: rm -rf ./compile && mkdir compile && npm run build
scripts.compile: npm run precompile && esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --outfile=compile/build.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node --external:*.node && cd compile && npx pkg build.cjs && npm run postcompile
